message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $18,000 to start. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your perspective on the price.  While $12,000 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to negotiate. How about $15,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $15,000 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $13,500?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  I can tell you're serious about the product. To make this happen, I can come down to $14,000. That's my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $13,000?
